item.title: The Lost Track
item.description: I’m one of those lazy ones when it comes to gym or jogging. I don’t even remember when I jogged last. Gym has been on and off with a total I can count with my fingers of one hand. After all it’s for those who want to be fit; not for those who are already fit. ðŸ˜‰ Anyhow, I started practicing for a 5K run scheduled for June 24th Sunday morning.
